title: Omukriste nyanyukwa
author: J.Regnart
lyrics:
Omukriste nyanyukwa, U tange Omuwa mpa.
Omukulili ngu gwoye Kwa thiki wo kungoye.
Amuhe nyanyukweni, Hosianna mu imbileni!

Oye omupangeli Gwegulu nevi ndi, Te ende kokasino. Eishonopeko ndino! Amuhe nyanyukweni...

Omukwathi gwoye ngo Ye omunambili wo. Ot' eta omagano, Ngoy' u ga taambe ano. Amuhe nyanyukweni...

Ote ku indile, Uninge shili gwe, Ye e ku kuth' omutenge. Pohambanda e ku lenge. Amuhe nyanyukweni...

Moonkandja dhokusa Okwe ku kulila.Aatondi e ya sindi, Mbo ya li ye ku hindi. Amuhe nyanyukweni...

Esilohenda lye Nuuyamb' auhe we ote u ku pe shili. Oshike we to lili? Amuhe nyanyukweni...

 Omukwathi gwoye ngo U mu egulule po.
Pungoye ngu a hala Aluhe okukala.
Amuhe nyanyukweni...

Nenyanyu mu popitha U kunde Omuwa mpa!
Ye omukwaniliwa gwoye Nesimano wo lyoye.
Amuhe nyanyukweni...

Pombanda mu imbila, Ngoy’ mu hambelela Ohole ye
no henda Ofule ngu nependa! Amuhe nyanyu weni...

Aanona wo naa ye Nayo ye mu imbile Naakuluntu

ayehe Naa imbe nomuntu kehe. Amuhe nyanyukweni...

title: Osheelo shomomwenyo mpa
lyrics:
Osheelo shomomwenyo mpa Omuyenda ngo shi tamena.Te ya kungoye nena ndji, Omuwa waKalunga_a zi.Nkee hambelela, nyanyukwa! Egulu lye ku zimina.
Omukulili na simane, Oshoka ye a toola ndje.

OJesus Kristus ote ya, Ohend’ oyindji e yi na.
 Uyuyuki wo uulenga we. Ha pangele nombili ye.
Ha panga uuvumbu wa gee, Uundjolowele te tu pe.Onkee tu mu hambelelele Ohenda ye nohole ye.

Elago aantu ye li na, Ya taamba Jesus, sho e ya,Oyo ya mon’ efudhitho Nombili wo negameno.
Oye li po taa yambekwa. Moondunge taa ka kalekwa.
Omwenyo gwanje, ngoye wo, U mu tangele ohenda ndjo.

Omwenyo gwoye matula, Ilongekidhila Omuwa.
Kungoye tuu oye te ya Onena ndji nopeha mpa. A hala ku ku nyanyudha Nombili ku ku yambeka, Nkee Jesus tatu mu pandula. Nokutse wo sho te ya mpa.

OJesus Kristus, ila mo Momwenyo gwanḓj’ u kale mo, U lele mo nohenda ndjo Aluhe nomungame wo, Megulu ngoy’ u fale ndje Mutoye, ndi ku imbile. Ond’ uvu ko, wa ti, to ya. Yaloo, Omuwa, nda nyanyukwa!

title: Hosianna Jesus Kristus
author: G. J. Vogler Iwopo
verses: Hosianna mokombanda, Hosianna, Hosianna, Omuna gwaDavid oonguka, Te ya medhina ly’Omuwa! Hosianna mokombanda, Hosianna, Hosianna, OmunagwaDavid oonguka, Te ya medhina ly’Omuwa! Hosianna mokombanda, Hosianna, Hosianna, OmunagwaDavid oonguka, Te ya medhina ly’Omuwa! Hosianna Jesus Kristus, Na hambelelwe ngu, Omuna gwaDavid oonguka, Te ya medhina ly’Omuwa! Hosianna Jesus Kristus, Na hambelelwe ngu, Omuna gwa- David oonguka, Te ya medhina ly’Omuwa! Hosianna mokombanda, Hosianna, Hosianna, OmunagwaDavid oonguka, Te ya medhina ly’Omuwa! Hosianna mokombanda, Hosianna, Hosianna, Omuna gwaDavid oonguka, Te ya medhina ly’Omuwa!
attribution:
ONGOWELA: Georg Joseph Vogler Iwopo – 1795Omundo-wishi 1749–1814 
IITYA: Mat 21:9; Eps 118:25–26

title: Omunene gwomuSioni
author: H. Klemetti
verses: Omunene gwomuSioni, GwaDavid, ngov’ omuyapuki, Esilohenda u li na, Oonkondo dhoye dhi tu pa.
Ombili twe yi yuulukwa, Neifupipiko ndyo lya pwa. Tu shitulula, tu ku fe, Ombep’ Ondjapuki u tu pe.
Hosianna tatu ligola Noku ku taamba putse mpa, GwaDavid, Mukwathi, u tu pe Ehipitho, Omuholike.
attribution:
ONGOWELA: Heikki Klemetti 1905 Omusoomi 1876–1953
IITYA: Kaarlo Aukusti Terhi (Hammar) 1898

title: Omuwa nge te ya
lyrics:
Omuwa nge te ya, te tu talaleke, Esiku lyenyanyu oondyoka.Elaka etoye okwe li tu pe, Oohapu twe dh’ uvu oondhoka:Omuyalek’ e ya! Ngoye penduka po! Ka teme onyeka,u matuke ko. Omuyalekwa ngoye wa kotha.

Ethimbo efupi olyo nolya pu, Uusiku mbu uule wa hiti.Kegulu eluwa lya tendele tuu, Etango lyaaluhe lya piti.Omuyalek’ e ya! Ngoye penduka po! Ka teme onyeka,u matuke ko. Omuyalekwa ngoye wa kotha.

Ee, Jesus, Omuwa, otwa hala, u ye, Onale otse twe ku hala.Nkee thikama mbala, u endelele. Nenyanyu otatu ku tala.Omuyalek’ e ya! Ngoye penduka po! Ka teme onyeka,u matuke ko. Omuyalekwa ngoye wa kotha.

Yaloo, Omuwa, owa hala okuya Kaamwoye nombili onene.Oonkondo dhasatan’ u yone po mpa, Ongoye awike u lele.Yaloo, iyaloo, twe ku ligolele. Yaloo, iyaloo,twe ku hambelele U ile omuyalekwa gwoye.

title: Eshigo lyetu
author: yOshifulanisa
verses: Eshigo lyetu, ngoy’ Omuwa, Kalung’ Omwana, we ya mpa Nowe tu pe ehupitho Muupika nomekaneno.
Kungoye tw’ isizimike, Koomwenyo tu ku pandule. Mokusa u tu kuthe mo, Momwenyo u tu fale mo.
Mbepo ndjo yoye u tu pe, Aluhe e tu yakule. Mondjila u tu endithe, Megulu u tu thikithe.
Muudhighu wetu tu u na, Mokusa wo tu yakula, Naamuka nomegulu wo Tse tu ku pe esimano.
attribution:
ONGOWELA: yOshifulanisa 1551
IITYA: David Behme, Omundowishi 1605-1657

title: Ongundu ndjo ya adhima
author: G. Lewenhaupt
verses: Muyapuki Kalunga! Omunaenghon' adishe, Tangwa nena, Finemanekwa kovamwoye fyell Muyapuki, u yadi Filonghend' alishe, Katatu-umwe, hatu ku_imbile!
Muyapuki waalushshe! Ovayapuki yo Tave k' umbile oishani yavo pedu pee! Ve ku finameke, Novaengeli yo Tave ku twil' eengolo, Mukwaalushe.
Muyapuki wa mana! Nand' oshinge shoye Ofye av'omesho etu e shi holekwa, Ov' auke timbu! Nomohole yoye, Meenghono nomouyuuki owa pwa!
Muyapuki Kalunga! Shito loy' alishe Tali tumbalek' edina loy' apeshe nee, Muyapuki, Munanghenda , Omunaenghono' adishe! Katatu-umwe, hatu ku imbile!
attribution:
ONGOWELA John Bacchus Dykes 1861 Omwiingilisha 1823-1876

OITYA:Reginald Heber 1826 Omwiingilisha 1783-1826

title: Ongundu ndjo ya adhima
author: G. Lewenhaupt
verses: Ongundu ndjo ya adhima, Opii ya zi? lishani wo oye yi na, Oyo aasindani.
Oonguwo dhawo yedhi na Dha simana. Kalunga e ya zaleka Nuuyelele wa pwa.
Moongodh' oondhigu ya zi mo, Ayehe mbo. Ya ya, ya vululukwe po, Ya man' ekondjelo.
Muuyuni mbu sho ya li mo, Oondjendi mbo, Uunkundi nolugodhi wo Oye lu uvu ko.
Momeho ye n' adhimo Lyuuyelele. Ga yela, ge n' eadhimo, Nando ya lilile.
Mitenge ye dhi tula po, Ya thikithwa. Oongodhi ye dhi thigi ko, Nodho dha mwenekwa.
Ongashingey' ya kundukidha Omukulili. Taa imbi nokuligola, Oya naayengeli.
Enyanyu lyaa n' ehulilo Oye li na. Ya thiki kuHe yawo ngo, Noyo taa fudhithwa.

title: Tate Megulu
verses: Tate megulu, ngoye Mushiti gwetu sil' ohenda Muka inekelo lyetu. Otse aamwoye, u tu lyomayehe nosho moondjenda.
Nali yapul' edhina lyoy' enene Maantu ayehe nosho tse wo tu moondjenda.
Naku ze mbala oshilongo shoye, Aantu ayehe hilila mutse yele.
Tate, ehala lyooye li tu lele, Ngaashi megulu tala ketu.
Tu pa ilikulya twe yi pumbwa nena shili, Gandja ombili pokumena. Tu pa elelo ewanawa omekili, Gandja ombili pokumena.
Dhimapo tu pa ohole meendjandha lyetu, Kalungapumpo omii aakwetu.
Ihe tu kwatha muuwinayi tu, tu fala wo megulu lyooye, Shili nosho ng'olutu nduka. Omuuwa ndika. Ngaashika we tu pa nosh' olupudhi.
Tate, otu n' egalikano u vila edhina lyooye. Tatu ti: Amen.
attribution:
ONGOWELA: oyapEmbilO Jaakpetrus Tritonius (Treibenreif) 1507
Omuaustralia 1475-1524?
IITYA: Jaakko Suomalainen,lwopo 1583 Omusoomi 1540-1588
